rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Each number 'N' outside the grid indicates that the first N digits from the corresponding direction have the same parity and the N+1 digit has the opposite parity.
